All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Centroid
Represents a centroid in the KMeans algorithm.
KMeans
A class that implements the K-means algorithm using Hadoop MapReduce.
KMeansCombiner
The KMeansCombiner class extends the Reducer class and is used to combine the intermediate results of the KMeans clustering algorithm.
KMeansMapper
Mapper class for the K-Means algorithm.
KMeansReducer
Reducer class for the KMeans algorithm.
KMeansUtil
Utility class for the KMeans algorithm.
Point
Represents a point in the KMeans algorithm.
